name: PET Bottle
description: Polyethylene terephthalate, commonly used for water and beverage bottles. (Plastic #1)

name: HDPE Jug
description: High-density polyethylene, used for milk jugs, shampoo bottles. (Plastic #2)

name: LDPE Film
description: Low-density polyethylene, used for plastic bags and films. (Plastic #4)

name: PP Container
description: Polypropylene, used for food containers, yogurt tubs. (Plastic #5)

name: Glass Jar
description: Container for food items like jams and pickles.

name: Compostable PLA Cup
description: Polylactic acid, a bioplastic made from renewable resources. Requires industrial composting.
